sentences.sentence: He was dressed in court livery.
Two servants came in rich livery and carried the Fir Tree into a large and splendid drawing-room.
sentences.translation: 两个穿得很讲究的仆人走来了，把这枞树抬到一间漂亮的大客厅里去。

sentences.sentence: The horses were post; and neither the carriage, nor the livery of the servant who preceded it, were familiar to them.
sentences.translation: 马是驿站上的马，至于马车本身，车前待从所穿的号服，他们也不熟悉。
